meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or rank; excellent.
meanings.sent1: The topflight restaurant received a five-star rating.
meanings.sent2: She always delivers topflight performances in her plays.
meanings.sent3: The topflight cupcakes were so good, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: His topflight skills in basketball made him stand out among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The topflight sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A person or thing of the highest quality or rank.
meanings.sent1: The singer was a topflight in the music industry.
meanings.sent2: The topflight of the fashion world attended the event.
meanings.sent3: The topflight of the cake was the cherry on top!
meanings.sent4: She was the topflight of the team, always leading by example.
meanings.sent5: The topflight of the mountain offered breathtaking views.
